name: OneOfDiffTest
description: Tests for differences in OpenAPI documents using oneOf schemas.

test_cases.name: testDiffSame
test_cases.description: Tests that two identical OpenAPI documents are considered equal.

test_cases.name: testDiffDifferentMapping
test_cases.description: Tests that two OpenAPI documents with different mappings are detected.

test_cases.name: testDiffSameWithOneOf
test_cases.description: Tests that two OpenAPI documents with oneOf schemas are considered equal.

test_cases.name: testComposedSchema
test_cases.description: Tests that two composed schemas are detected as backward incompatible.

test_cases.name: testComposedSchemaDiff
test_cases.description: Tests that two identical composed schemas are considered equal.

test_cases.name: testOneOfDiscrimitatorChanged
test_cases.description: Tests that a change in the discriminator of a oneOf schema is detected as backward incompatible.

test_cases.name: testOneOfDiscrimitatorMissingSameOrder
test_cases.description: Tests that two OpenAPI documents with missing discriminators in the same order are considered equal.

test_cases.name: testOneOfDiscrimitatorMissingDifferentOrder
test_cases.description: Tests that two OpenAPI documents with missing discriminators in different orders are considered equal.
